name: Surveillance automatisée des prix des concurrents avec Bright Data & n8n
description:
# 

## Description

Ce flux de travail surveille automatiquement les prix des produits de vos concurrents et vous notifie de tout changement. Il vous aide à rester compétitif sur le marché en fournissant des informations en temps réel sur les stratégies de prix sans vérification manuelle.

## Aperçu

Ce flux de travail suit automatiquement les prix de vos concurrents sur leurs sites Web et vous notifie de tout changement. Il utilise Bright Data pour extraire les données de prix et peut générer des rapports ou envoyer des alertes lorsque les prix changent.

### Outils Utilisés

*   **n8n :** La plateforme d'automatisation qui orchestre le flux de travail.
*   **Bright Data :** Pour extraire les sites Web des concurrents sans être bloqué.
*   **Tableurs/Bases de données :** Pour stocker et analyser les données de prix.
*   **Services de Notification :** Pour vous alerter des changements de prix significatifs.

## Comment Installer

1.  **Importer le Flux de Travail :** Téléchargez le fichier `.json` et importez-le dans votre instance n8n.
2.  **Configurer Bright Data :** Ajoutez vos identifiants Bright Data au nœud Bright Data.
3.  **Configurer le Stockage des Données :** Configurez où vous souhaitez stocker les données de prix.
4.  **Personnaliser :** Ajoutez les URL de vos concurrents et les produits spécifiques à surveiller.

## Cas d'Utilisation

*   **Entreprises de Commerce Électronique :** Restez compétitif avec une surveillance des prix en temps réel.
*   **Analystes de Prix :** Automatisez la collecte de données pour la stratégie de prix.
*   **Détaillants :** Ajustez votre stratégie de prix en fonction des tendances du marché.

---

## Connectez-vous avec Moi

*   **Site Web :** [https://www.nofluff.online](https://www.nofluff.online)
*   **YouTube :** [https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)
*   **LinkedIn :** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)
*   **Obtenez Bright Data :** [https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25](https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25) (Utiliser ce lien soutient mes flux de travail gratuits avec une petite commission)

#n8n #automatisation #tarification #analyseconcurrentielle #brightdata #commerceélectronique #surveillancedesprix #intelligenceconcurrentielle #suividesprix #analyse de marché #fluxde travailn8n #fluxde travail #nocode #stratégiedetarification #suividesconcurrents #outilsdecommerceélectronique #comparaisondesprix #intelligencecommerciale #recherchedemarché #tarificationconcurrentielle #automatisationdétaillants #alertesdeprix #donnéespilotées #extractionweb #analyse des prix #insightsconcurrents

parameters.message:
=

Hi Team,

This is an automated alert to inform you that the pricing page of a competitor has changed.

  • Competitor: Wix
  • Page URL: https://www.wix.com/upgrade/website
  • Checked On: {{ $now }}

Please review the new pricing to assess if any strategic adjustments are needed. Please check in Google sheets for the latest pricing as soon as possible

Best regards,
Muhammad Shahkar
parameters.subject: Competitor Pricing Page Has Changed

parameters.content:
## 🟢 **SECTION 1: Fetch the Latest Pricing Info**

### 📡 Scheduled Scraping Using Bright Data

| 🧩 Nodes Involved                   | 💬 Description                                                                                                                                               |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 🕒 **Check Pricing Every Hour**     | This **Schedule Trigger** runs your workflow automatically (e.g., every hour). You don’t have to manually check the website.                                 |
| 🌐 **Fetch Page via Bright Data**   | Uses **Bright Data Web Unlocker API** to bypass bot protections and fetch the HTML of the pricing page from a competitor site (e.g., Wix, Squarespace, etc). |
| 🧾 **Extract HTML Content**         | This node pulls out the actual **HTML code** of the page from the API response, ready to be analyzed.                                                        |
| 🔧 **Format & Isolate Price Block** | This custom code node filters or extracts just the **pricing section** (e.g., plan names, \$ amounts) from the HTML to compare later.                        |

> ✅ **Advantage for Beginners**: You don’t need to manually visit or inspect the site. Everything is automated and updated behind the scenes.

---

## 🟡 **SECTION 2: Check If the Price Has Changed**

### 🔍 Compare New Data with the Last Saved One

| 🧩 Nodes Involved            | 💬 Description                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 📄 **Read Last Saved Price** | This reads from a **Google Sheet** that stores the **last known pricing data**. This becomes your reference point for comparison.                                                                       |
| 🔁 **Has Price Changed?**    | A simple **IF condition** compares the current scraped pricing to the previously saved one. If the content is **exactly the same**, nothing happens. If it's **different**, it moves to the alert flow. |

> ✅ **Advantage for Beginners**: No need for complex logic. n8n handles the comparison using a basic condition node.

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## 🧠💼 Title:

**Competitor Pricing Page Monitor — Automated Alerts Using n8n + Bright Data**

This workflow automatically **monitors a competitor’s pricing page**, **detects changes**, and sends an **alert email** while keeping a record in **Google Sheets**. Perfect for businesses tracking market moves or SaaS competitors!

---

## 🟢 **SECTION 1: Fetch the Latest Pricing Info**

### 📡 Scheduled Scraping Using Bright Data

| 🧩 Nodes Involved                   | 💬 Description                                                                                                                                               |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 🕒 **Check Pricing Every Hour**     | This **Schedule Trigger** runs your workflow automatically (e.g., every hour). You don’t have to manually check the website.                                 |
| 🌐 **Fetch Page via Bright Data**   | Uses **Bright Data Web Unlocker API** to bypass bot protections and fetch the HTML of the pricing page from a competitor site (e.g., Wix, Squarespace, etc). |
| 🧾 **Extract HTML Content**         | This node pulls out the actual **HTML code** of the page from the API response, ready to be analyzed.                                                        |
| 🔧 **Format & Isolate Price Block** | This custom code node filters or extracts just the **pricing section** (e.g., plan names, \$ amounts) from the HTML to compare later.                        |

> ✅ **Advantage for Beginners**: You don’t need to manually visit or inspect the site. Everything is automated and updated behind the scenes.

---

## 🟡 **SECTION 2: Check If the Price Has Changed**

### 🔍 Compare New Data with the Last Saved One

| 🧩 Nodes Involved            | 💬 Description                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 📄 **Read Last Saved Price** | This reads from a **Google Sheet** that stores the **last known pricing data**. This becomes your reference point for comparison.                                                                       |
| 🔁 **Has Price Changed?**    | A simple **IF condition** compares the current scraped pricing to the previously saved one. If the content is **exactly the same**, nothing happens. If it's **different**, it moves to the alert flow. |

> ✅ **Advantage for Beginners**: No need for complex logic. n8n handles the comparison using a basic condition node.

---

## 🔴 **SECTION 3: Alert & Save New Price**

### 🚨 Notify + Update Sheet

| 🧩 Nodes Involved                    | 💬 Description                                                                                                                                          |
| ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ➖ **No Change Detected – Stop**      | If no changes were found, this does nothing and exits. Keeps your flow efficient.                                                                       |
| 📄 **Update Stored Price**           | If the price **has changed**, it writes the new value to the **Google Sheet** so future comparisons are accurate.                                       |
| 📧 **Send Price Change Alert Email** | This node sends a **professional email** (via Gmail) to alert you or your team about the pricing update. The email includes the date and the page link. |

> ✅ **Advantage for Beginners**: No need to monitor email manually or check sheets. You’re notified only when something meaningful happens!

---

## 🖼️ 📊 VISUAL WORKFLOW SUMMARY

```mermaid
graph TD;
  A[🕒 Schedule Trigger] --> B[🌐 Fetch via Bright Data];
  B --> C[🧾 Extract HTML];
  C --> D[🔧 Extract Pricing];
  D --> E[📄 Read Last Price from Sheet];
  E --> F{🔁 Has Price Changed?};
  F -- Yes --> G[📄 Update Sheet];
  G --> H[📧 Send Alert Email];
  F -- No --> I[➖ Do Nothing];
```

---

## 🌟 WHY THIS WORKFLOW IS POWERFUL (EVEN FOR BEGINNERS):

| Feature                  | Benefit                                                   |
| ------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| ✅ No Code                | Drag-and-drop automation — no dev experience needed       |
| 🔐 Unlocks Sites         | Bright Data handles websites that block scrapers          |
| 📈 Business Intelligence | Stay competitive by tracking market pricing in real-time  |
| 💬 Real-time Alerts      | Act fast with Gmail notifications when pricing changes    |
| 📝 Data Logging          | Google Sheets keeps a historical log of every price point |

---

## I’ll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link—thanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
